text: 2008 photo The Dhan Galli Bridge in Kashmir was constructed as part of redevelopment/resettlement in the general area affected by the Mangla Dam project. The Mangla Dam is the world's seventh largest dam. ==See also== *Rathoa Haryam Bridge, another (incomplete) bridge across the Mangla Dam reservoir ==References== Category:Bridges in Pakistan
title: Dhan Galli Bridge
